Package polito.sdp2017.DesignEnvironmentGui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ControlledScreen
    This is interface is implemented by any screen controller of this application; it forces the controllers to implement methods for specifying the application model and for setting the screen parent container.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationModel
    A Model class for the application, provides all the functionalities the View and the Controllers need for accessing the data managed by the application logic.
    Main
    Main class is the entry point for the application, where the GUI starts.
    ScreenCreateConfigController
    Controller for the createConfig screen of the application, which is in charge of create a new configuration to be added in the database.
    ScreenManageConfigController
    Controller for the manageConfig screen of the application, which is in charge of browsing the database configuration for deleting a configuration or for loading one on the fpga.
    ScreenManageIPController
    Controller for the manageIP screen of the application, which is in charge of browsing the IP database for deleting an IP or adding a new one.
    ScreensController
    ScreenController is a container class, able to store all the screens the application needs to display.
    ScreenStartController
    Controller for the main screen of the application, which is showed as soon as the application starts.
